PERSONA.NAME: King Henry the Sixth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Father to Edward, married to Margaret, a weak ruler and the last of the Lancastrian string. Murdered by Gloucester in the Tower of London.

PERSONA.NAME: Edward, Prince of Wales
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to King Henry, murdered at Tewkesbury by York's three sons.

PERSONA.NAME: Lewis the Eleventh
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: King of France, marries Lady Grey

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Clifford
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He murders York at the Battle of St. Albans to avenge his father's death.

PERSONA.NAME: Richard Plantagenet, Duke of York
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of York, Henry's successor to the throne. Captured and murdered by Queen Margaret and Clifford at the Battle of Wakefield.

PERSONA.NAME: Edward, Earl of March
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Afterwards King Edward IV, York's oldest son.

PERSONA.NAME: Edmund, Earl of Rutland
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: York's second son, murdered by Clifford.

PERSONA.NAME: George Plantagenet
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Afterwards Duke of Clarence, York's third son.

PERSONA.NAME: Richard Plantagenet
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Afterwards Duke of Gloucester, York's youngest son who is deformed. He murders both Henry and the Prince of Wales.

PERSONA.NAME: Earl of Warwick
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Allied to Earl of March but later forces him from office. Dies in battle.

PERSONA.NAME: Earl of Pembroke
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A noble loyal to Edward IV.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Hastings
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A noble loyal to Edward IV.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Stafford
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A noble loyal to Edward IV.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir John Mortimer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Uncle to the Duke of York

PERSONA.NAME: Sir Hugh Mortimer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Uncle to the Duke of York

PERSONA.NAME: Henry, Earl of Richmond
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A youth and future Henry VII.

PERSONA.NAME: Lieutenant of the Tower
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Protector of the London Tower and loyal to King Henry.

PERSONA.NAME: Nobleman
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Conveys news of Henry's capture to Edward.

PERSONA.NAME: First Keeper
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Sets an ambush in the forest.

PERSONA.NAME: Second Keeper
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Sets an ambush in the forest.

PERSONA.NAME: Huntsman
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A hunter with King Edward in a Yorkshire park.

PERSONA.NAME: Queen Margaret
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: French-born queen of England, eventually a strong military leader.

PERSONA.NAME: Lady Grey, Queen to Edward IV
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Formerly Elizabeth Woodville, afterwards Queen to Edward IV
